images.copyright: Bluebonnets growing alongside an old road in the Texas Hill Country (© Inge Johnsson/Alamy)
images.title: Where the wildflowers grow
images.caption: Where the wildflowers grow
images.desc: In honor of National Wildflower Week, we're looking at a splash of blooming bluebonnets, the state flower of Texas. If you notice bluebonnets and other blooms while traveling down Texas highways, thank the state's Department of Transportation, which sows tens of thousands of pounds of wildflower seeds along roadways each year.
